content.raw:
Number lines in atlas_sandia_hands.urdf after being converted to sdf:

With debs:
~~~
$ gz sdf -p /opt/ros/indigo/share/drcsim_gazebo_standalone_models/atlas_sandia_hands/atlas_sandia_hands.urdf | wc -l
...
6982
~~~

With this internal urdfdom 0.3:
~~~
$ gz sdf -p atlas_sandia_hands.urdf | wc -l
...
6192
~~~
I need to go back and check the 0.2 version built against external urdfdom
